thread.title: Danica Patrick's sponsor apparently forgot to check its mentions, according to lawsuit
thread.title_full: Danica Patrick's sponsor apparently forgot to check its mentions, according to lawsuit

author: USA TODAY Sports
title: Danica Patrick's sponsor apparently forgot to check its mentions, according to lawsuit
text:
Danica Patrick's sponsor apparently forgot to check its mentions, according to lawsuit Danica Patrick is very popular on social media. Post to Facebook Danica Patrick's sponsor apparently forgot to check its mentions, according to lawsuit Danica Patrick is very popular on social media.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/danica-patrick-sponsor-natures-bakery-stewart-haas-racing-lawsuit/   Danica Patrick's sponsor apparently forgot to check its mentions, according to lawsuit Adi Joseph , USA TODAY Sports 7:07   
Danica Patrick drove for Nature's Bakery. (Photo: Jeffrey Becker-USA TODAY Sports) 
So one of Danica Patrick's sponsors decided to stop paying her and Stewart-Haas Racing at some point last season and now is being sued because that's the kind of thing one might expect to happen in this case. 
The company owes millions to SHR - read more about the lawsuit here - and had a pretty interesting explanation for its motivation: 
SHR also accused the company of eventually concocting "a scheme to avoid further payments" by claiming Patrick had been endorsing competing products and was not using her social media presence enough to promote (it). 
Now, we're not going to bother telling you the name of the company, but we are going to pull some of Patrick's tweets and Instagram posts from 2016 just in case you can guess it. Empty! @NaturesBakery boxes don't last long in this house. ðŸ˜‹ I think I need to put a big order in! pic.twitter.com/aILrNScpGz
